meanings.definition: A person who cultivates citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: Citriculturists work hard to grow delicious oranges and lemons.
meanings.sent2: The citriculturists in Florida take care of the orange groves.
meanings.sent3: Why did the citriculturists bring a ladder to the lemon tree? To reach the highest fruits!
meanings.sent4: The citriculturists are like artists painting with vibrant citrus colors on the trees.
meanings.sent5: The scent of citrus surrounds the citriculturists as they tend to their fruit-filled orchards.

meanings.definition: The practice of cultivating citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: Learning about citriculturists involves understanding the care needed for citrus trees.
meanings.sent2: Citriculturists study the best methods for growing grapefruits and limes.
meanings.sent3: The citriculturists held a contest to see who could juggle the most oranges without dropping any.
meanings.sent4: In the world of agriculture, citriculturists are the bright stars that bring life to citrus groves.
meanings.sent5: The citriculturists' dedication to their craft shines through in the juicy fruits they produce.
